summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 4, Pettit's University Addition and block 14, Assessor's Plat of University Heights Addition, being the alley between 12th Avenue Northeast, and Brooklyn Avenue, from East 52nd Street to East 55th Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 95018 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
